function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"High incidence of results in education support reflecting the need for alternative school risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Dissemination of covid-19 cases shown on the map","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Adoption of digital tooling in
